desc: Shop soda by the bottle. Free shipping to your door. 100% pure cane sugar in glass bottles. Independent producers like Sprecher, Boylan, Blenheim, Vernor's and Maine Root. Find curated selections of root beer, ginger ale, ginger beer, cream soda, sparkling lemonade, lemon-lime soda and dozens of fruit flavors.

layout.text: Save your fridge from ho hum cola
Discover Favorite Brands, New Flavors And Cult Classics
